cab.content: THIS DOCUMBirT IG Tig; PROPERTY OF HIS BE ITALIC MAJESTY' S government-fKEKT ) .sj: C RET, ,?. 10 (25),fCi B H ET,NAVAL BASE AT SINGAPORE,Telegram from the Secretary of State for the Colonies to the Governor of Hong Kong. (Sent 4,10 p,ru6, 1st January, 1925 ) o(Circulated, by the Secretary of State for the Colonies in con-tinuance of C.P. 550 (24) ),Your telegram, of 16th December, His Majesty's Government most gratefully accept the offer which you with the approval of unofficial members of both Councils have made to contribute the sum of 250.000 representing profits of shipping control during the war to the expenses of Singapore base. This very generous contribution will be of material assistance to an important work of Imperial defence.I should have wished to send immediate reply to your telegram but consideration of certain details connected, with the offer has involved delay which I greatly regret.2, V/hit elia 11 Gardens , S , .V . 1 january?/ 5th, 1925,
